sentences.en: Can you speak any foreign languages?
sentences.cn: 你会讲外语吗？

sentences.en: During the turmoil in the foreign-exchange markets the guilder remained strong.
sentences.cn: 荷兰盾在外汇交易市场的动荡中保持坚挺。

sentences.en: Foreign aid workers will not be allowed into the stricken areas.
sentences.cn: 国外救援人员不准进入灾区。

sentences.en: Foreign Office officials assisted with transport and finance problems.
sentences.cn: 外交部官员帮助解决运输和经费问题。

sentences.en: foreign students
sentences.cn: 外国学生

sentences.en: He continues to insulate his country from the contagion of foreign ideas.
sentences.cn: 他继续使本国远离外来思想的侵袭。

sentences.en: He put the case to the Saudi Foreign Minister.
sentences.cn: 他把这起事件向沙特外长作了说明。

sentences.en: I thought she sounded foreign.
sentences.cn: 我觉得她说话像外国人。

sentences.en: Over the years he's demonstrated a certain prescience in foreign affairs.
sentences.cn: 这些年来，他已经在外交事务方面表现出一定的预见性。

sentences.en: The American dollar finished the day up against foreign currencies.
sentences.cn: 美元汇率今日收盘时有所上涨。

sentences.en: The foreign ministers of the two countries signed the documents today.
sentences.cn: 两国的外交大臣今天签署了文件。

sentences.en: The Foreign Office in London has expressed surprise at these allegations.
sentences.cn: 位于伦敦的英国外交部对这些说法表示惊讶.

sentences.en: The Foreign Secretary's views on the treaty are well-documented and oft-repeated.
sentences.cn: 外交大臣就该条约发表的观点有大量记述并被屡屡提及。

sentences.en: The majority of foreign nationals working here have work permits.
sentences.cn: 大多数在这里工作的外国人都有工作许可证。

sentences.en: the success of foreign companies in various industries
sentences.cn: 外国公司在各行业的成功

sentences.en: The Swiss wanted to discourage an inflow of foreign money.
sentences.cn: 瑞士人想要阻止外资流入。

sentences.en: The US dollar is down against most foreign currencies today.
sentences.cn: 今天美元对大多数外汇的比价都有所下降。

sentences.en: The very notion of price competition is foreign to many schools.
sentences.cn: 价格竞争这个概念对于许多学校都很陌生。

sentences.en: They siphon foreign aid money into their personal bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 他们把国外救济金非法转入了个人银行账户。

sentences.en: transactions in foreign currencies
sentences.cn: 外汇买卖

phrases.tran_cn: n. 外国直接投资，对外直接投资
外汇；国际汇兑；外国汇票
外国学生，外籍学生；留学生

trans.tran_cn: 外国的，外交的，异质的，陌生的
trans.tran_en: from or relating to a country that is not your own
